combat1.name: Rite of Dispelling Winds
combat1.descriptionRaw:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 3 attacks, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and fires off a shot, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents along the path. Deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.
combat1.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 3 attacks, dealing Anemo DMG.

Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and fires off a shot, dealing AoE Anemo DMG.

Plunging Attack
Plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents along the path. Deals AoE Anemo DMG upon impact with the ground.

combat2.name: Airborne Disease Prevention
combat2.descriptionRaw:
It's time for the real bash bros to step up! Ifa calls Cacucu in as backup.
After using this skill, Ifa gains 80 Nightsoul points and enters the {LINK#N11130003}<color=#FFD780FF>Nightsoul's Blessing</color>{/LINK} state. In the Nightsoul's Blessing state, Ifa will hover with Cacucu's help. When he uses Normal Attacks in this state, he will use different kinds of {LINK#N11130001}<color=#FFD780FF>Supporting Fire</color>{/LINK} depending on whether you Tap or Hold, firing Tonicshots that are capable of healing all party members.

Additionally, Holding the Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Airborne Disease Prevention</color> while Ifa is in Nightsoul's Blessing will cause him to use a Nightsoul-aligned Plunging Attack. Letting go of the skill button will interrupt this Plunging Attack to maintain his hover. If Ifa lands due to this Plunging Attack, his Nightsoul's Blessing state will end.
combat2.description:
It's time for the real bash bros to step up! Ifa calls Cacucu in as backup.
After using this skill, Ifa gains 80 Nightsoul points and enters the **Nightsoul's Blessing** state. In the Nightsoul's Blessing state, Ifa will hover with Cacucu's help. When he uses Normal Attacks in this state, he will use different kinds of **Supporting Fire** depending on whether you Tap or Hold, firing Tonicshots that are capable of healing all party members.

Additionally, Holding the Elemental Skill Airborne Disease Prevention while Ifa is in Nightsoul's Blessing will cause him to use a Nightsoul-aligned Plunging Attack. Letting go of the skill button will interrupt this Plunging Attack to maintain his hover. If Ifa lands due to this Plunging Attack, his Nightsoul's Blessing state will end.

labels: Tonicshot Healing On Hit|{param2:F1P} Elemental Mastery+{param3:F1}

combat3.name: Compound Sedation Field
combat3.descriptionRaw:
Fires a Therapeutic Sedative at a (temporarily aggressive) opponent. The sedative will explode on impact, creating a restraining wind current that pulls nearby objects and opponents in while dealing Nightsoul-aligned <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color>.
When the Therapeutic Sedative hits an opponent affected by <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro</color>/<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>/<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>/<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro</color>, it will apply a {LINK#N11130004}<color=#FFD780FF>Sedation Mark</color>{/LINK} to them.
combat3.description:
Fires a Therapeutic Sedative at a (temporarily aggressive) opponent. The sedative will explode on impact, creating a restraining wind current that pulls nearby objects and opponents in while dealing Nightsoul-aligned AoE Anemo DMG.
When the Therapeutic Sedative hits an opponent affected by Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will apply a **Sedation Mark** to them.

passive1.name: Field Medic's Vision
passive1.descriptionRaw: When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every 1 Nightsoul point out of the total in his entire party will grant him 1 {LINK#N11130002}<color=#FFD780FF>Rescue Essentials</color>{/LINK} point. Rescue Essentials will increase the Swirl, Electro-Charged, and Lunar-Charged DMG dealt by nearby party members.
passive1.description: When Ifa is in the Nightsoul's Blessing state, every 1 Nightsoul point out of the total in his entire party will grant him 1 **Rescue Essentials** point. Rescue Essentials will increase the Swirl, Electro-Charged, and Lunar-Charged DMG dealt by nearby party members.

passive2.name: Mutual Aid Agreement
passive2.descriptionRaw: When nearby party members trigger Nightsoul Bursts, Ifa's Elemental Mastery increases by 80 for 10s.
passive2.description: When nearby party members trigger Nightsoul Bursts, Ifa's Elemental Mastery increases by 80 for 10s.

passive3.name: Night Realm's Gift: Focused Emergency Rescue
passive3.descriptionRaw:
After his Nightsoul points are exhausted, Ifa will switch to consuming Phlogiston to maintain his Nightsoul's Blessing.
While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, he can use Nightsoul Transmission: Ifa. When the active character is a certain height in the air, the following will occur when switching to Ifa: Ifa will enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state and gain 32 Nightsoul points. Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your own team.
passive3.description:
After his Nightsoul points are exhausted, Ifa will switch to consuming Phlogiston to maintain his Nightsoul's Blessing.

Nightsoul Transmission can be triggered once every 10s by your own team.

passive4.name: Tactical Warm Compress Bandaging
passive4.descriptionRaw: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, when the current active party member or indwelt saurian has less than 40% HP, Ifa will consume 10 Phlogiston and restore 40% of their HP. This effect can trigger once every 10s, and does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss.
passive4.description: While in an area with Phlogiston Mechanics within Natlan, when the current active party member or indwelt saurian has less than 40% HP, Ifa will consume 10 Phlogiston and restore 40% of their HP. This effect can trigger once every 10s, and does not take effect in Domains, Trounce Domains, or the Spiral Abyss.
